1.title: Welcome to Chikawala
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

locations: Night Owl Cabins, Pike Lake, Saskatchewan, Canada::(on location)
imdb.plot outline: Nine camp counselors arrive at Camp Chikawala the weekend before campers arrive. Just like every summer previous, the counselors enjoy a weekend of drinking, flirting, and catching up with one another - there is no shortage of drama, especially with this group of people. As the night begins, old counselors pick up where they left off last summer all while the new counselors try to find where they fit in with the group. They all have one thing in common though, they can all agree that Jack is heartless and he isn't afraid to show it. He seems to stir the pot whether he wants to or not. The night begins to go array when the counselors have their fair share of drinks and begin to split up. There are fights, break-ups, blossoming romances, and decisions made that will change the course of the entire summer. Camp Chikawala is known for "fresh air, everlasting friendships, and unforgettable moments", but this summer will be nothing but despair, mystery, and terrible decisions.
